segments.text: I see a woman blissfully drying a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t realize the water is pouring over the sink, forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is almost idyllic outside, with the garden looking so peaceful and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, chaos is quietly brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a boy climbing on that unstable stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, but I can't help but feel anxious about the fall he might take.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there’s the girl, standing there, her hand reaching up expectantly as if she’s in on the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR
